repo.name: Aidoku Repository
repo.subtitle: A free and open source manga reader for iOS and iPadOS

apps.name: Aidoku
apps.subtitle: A free and open source manga reader for iOS and iPadOS
apps.localizedDescription:
Aidoku is a free and open source manga reading application for iOS and iPadOS.


FEATURES

External Sources
• Add a multitude of external sources to browse hundreds of different titles.

Open Source
• Fully open source and ad-free, forever.
• Contribute on GitHub!

Configurable
• Customize Aidoku to your liking with global and source-specific settings

• iCloud Sync Support
• Downloads
• Tracker Support


More information at https://aidoku.app/

privacy.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Aidoku needs FaceID permissions for user-defined settings.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Aidoku needs permission to save pages in your photo library.
